<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk run rules on tickets"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/run-rules"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Executes automation rules against multiple tickets in a single bulk operation. Use this to trigger rule evaluation and actions across a batch of tickets.

**Prerequisites**
1. **TicketIds** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to find tickets and collect `Items[].TicketId` values.
2. **Rule Configuration** – Identify which rules to execute.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search tickets: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) → collect `TicketId` array
2. Bulk run rules: POST /api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/run-rules with ticket IDs and rule settings
3. Verify: Check tickets for expected rule-triggered changes

**Related Endpoints**

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for bulk running rules against tickets.","properties":{"TicketIds":{"type":"array","description":"Array of ticket identifiers to process.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"minItems":1},"Request":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Request payload describing which rules/actions to run across a set of entities.","properties":{"EntityTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Entity type identifier.","example":"888891ac-91aa-e711-80c2-100dffa00001"},"EntityIds":{"type":"array","description":"Entity identifiers to process.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"nullable":true},"RuleIds":{"type":"array","description":"Rule identifiers to run.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"nullable":true},"RuleActionIds":{"type":"array","description":"Rule action identifiers to run.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"nullable":true},"IsSimulation":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, execute in simulation mode.","default":false},"IsActionEntityCreationPermitted":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, rules may create related entities during execution.","default":false},"ReturnRuleExecutionLogs":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, rule execution logs are returned.","default":true}},"required":["EntityTypeId"],"title":"BulkRunEntityRuleRequest"}],"type":"object","description":"Rule execution request applied to the selected tickets."}},"required":["TicketIds","Request"],"title":"BulkRunTicketRulesRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
